high_descs: Turn to your left and go to the sink, then make a right to go to the other sink closest to the wall.
Pick up the bar of soap from the counter on the right side of the sink.
Place the bar of soap in the sink, turn the water on, wash the sink, turn the water off and remove the bar of soap.
Step back from the sink with the bar of soap.
Place the bar of soap in the right cabinet, under the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put a wet bar of soap under the sink.

high_descs: Turn left and head to the vanity with the sinks. the turn right and cross the room, turn left to face the sink on the right
Pick up the soap that is on the right of the ink
Place the soap into the sink and then turn on the water to rinse the soap. Then turn off the water
Take a step backwards and continue to face the sink
Open the right cabinet and place the soap inside and to the left, then close the cabinet
tasks.task_desc: Place wet soap into a cabinet

high_descs: Go to the sink
Pick up the pink soap to the right of the sink
Put the soap in the sink, turn on the water, drain the sink and pick up the soap
Turn left in a full circle
Open the bottom right cabinet drawer under the sink and put the soap on the left front side.
tasks.task_desc: Wash the soap and put it in a cabinet under the sink

high_descs: Go across the room to the toilet paper holder hanging from the wall, on the left of the toilet.
Remove the toilet paper from the toilet paper holder on the wall.
Turn to the counter space, between the two sinks, on your left.
Place the toilet paper roll on the empty counter space between the two sinks.
Turn around and go to the right side of the toilet.
Pick up the empty toilet paper roll from the right side of the back of the toilet.
Turn to your left and go back to the sink across from you.
Place the empty toilet paper roll on the counter between the two sinks, to the right of the full roll of toilet paper.
tasks.task_desc: Put an empty and a full toilet paper roll on the counter.

high_descs: Walk to the left of the toilet to the toilet paper dispenser,
Pick up the roll of toilet paper.
Walk to the counter between the two sinks.
Put the toilet paper roll on the edge of the counter.
Walk to the back of the toilet.
Pick up the empty roll of toilet paper in front of the spray bottle.
Walk back over to the counter in between the two sinks.
Put the empty roll of toilet paper to the left of the full roll of toilet paper.
tasks.task_desc: To move a full roll of toilet paper and an empty roll to the counter.

high_descs: Turn around and stand on the left side of the toilet.
Pick the toilet paper roll up from the back of the toilet.
Turn around to face the counter in the middle of the sinks.
Put the toilet paper down on the counter between the sinks.
Turn around and face the floor to the left of the toilet.
Pick the empty roll up from the floor.
Turn to the left and face the counter between the sinks.
Put the empty roll down on the counter to the left of the roll of toilet paper.
tasks.task_desc: Put a full and one empty roll of toilet paper on a counter.

high_descs: walk to face right sink cabinet
take out toilet roll from bottom right cabinet
move left to face counter between sinks
put toilet roll on counter
walk to face toilet paper hanger
pick up toilet paper from toilet paper hanger
walk to face counter between sinks
put toilet paper on counter
tasks.task_desc: put toilet roll and paper on bathroom counter

high_descs: Turn and go to the counter in between the two sinks.
Pick up the candle that is on the counter.
Turn and go to the toilet on the side where the towel is hanging on the wall.
Place the candle behind the empty roll of toilet paper that is on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Move the candle to the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Move to the bathroom vanity.
Pick up the candle from the vanity.
Turn around and move to the right side of the toilet.
Set the candle on the back of the toilet to the left of the toilet paper roll.
tasks.task_desc: Put a candle on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: walk forward to the sink, take two steps to the right
pick up the candle that is on the counter between the sinks
turn around, walk to shower, turn left, walk to the wall, turn left to face toilet
put the candle on the back of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: move candle from counter to back of toilet

high_descs: go to the sink
pick up the candle to the right of the sink
take the candle to the toilet
put the candle on the toilet tank
tasks.task_desc: take the candle from the sink to the toilet

high_descs: Move right then face the far right side of the counter top right of the sink
Pick up the candle stick on top of the sink
Carry the candle stick over to the toilet
Place the candle stick on top of the toilet on the far right side of the toilet tank
tasks.task_desc: Move a candle to the toilet tank

high_descs: Turn to the right and face the sink on the right.
Pick the candle up from the right of the sink.
Turn around and cross the room to stand on the right side of the toilet.
Put the candle down on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Put a candle on a toilet.

high_descs: turn left, take a step, turn right, walk to the sink
pick up the candle that is on the counter by the sink
turn around, walk to the shower, turn left, walk to wall, turn left to face the toilet
put the candle on the back of the toilet
tasks.task_desc: move candle from counter to back of toilet

high_descs: Walk ahead to the sink on the left.
Pick up the yellow candle on the counter.
Turn around and walk to the other side of the toilet.
Place the candle on the toilet tank lid, in front of the tissue box.
tasks.task_desc: Place a candle on a toilet tank lid.

high_descs: Walk forward to the candle on the counter by the sink on the left.
Pick up the candle from the counter.
Turn around, walk forward to the shower, turn left and walk to the towel on the wall, then turn left towards the toilet.
Put the candle on the top of the toilet, in front of the box of tissues.
tasks.task_desc: Move a candle from a counter to the top of a toilet.

high_descs: Step forward to face the rag on the wall.
Pick up the rag on the wall.
Turn left and step forward to face the bath tub.
Place the rag in the bath tub.
tasks.task_desc: To move a rag from the wall to the bath tub.

high_descs: Move forward and to the right, to the right sink.
Take the towel from the wall, right of the sink.
Turn around, bring the towel to the tub on the right.
Put the towel in the tub.

high_descs: Walk ahead, veering right to the right sink.
Take the towel off of the towel rack on the wall.
Turn left and walk to the tub.
Place the towel in the tub, near the front lip, to the right of the drain.
tasks.task_desc: Place a towel in a tub.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the tub then turn left and walk to the wall then turn left.
Pick up the towel that's on a ring on the wall to your right.
Turn left and walk over to the tub ahead of you to your left.
Put the towel in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a towel in the tub.

high_descs: turn around and go to the bathroom sink
pick up the towel from the towel rack
turn around and go to the bath tub
place the towel in the tub

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the far sink.
Take the towel off the towel rack on the wall.
Turn left and walk to the bathtub.
Place the towel in the bathtub close to the drain.
tasks.task_desc: Place a towel in a bathtub.

high_descs: Go forward and turn to the left to face the towel hanging to the left of the counter.
Pick the towel up from the towel holder.
Turn around and then turn to the right to face the tub.
Put the towel in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a towel in a tub.

high_descs: Move to the towel over the trash can, to the right.
Take the towel from the holder.
Turn around, bring the towel to the tub on the right.
Put the towel in the tub, left of the rags.

high_descs: Turn right, turn left at the small bin on the floor, and look up to the right of the light switch.

Turn around and walk to the tub on the right.
Put the towel in the tub to the left of the rags.

high_descs: Head to the tub in front of you.
Pick up the rag closest to you in the tub.
Turn around, bring the rag to the right sink to the left.
Wash the rag in the right sink with water.
Turn left, bring the cleaned rag back to the tub.
Put the rag in the tub, left of the other rag.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned rag in the tub.

high_descs: Take a step to your right then walk to the tub.
Pick up the dirty purple wash cloth in the tub that's closest to you.
Turn right and take a step then turn right and walk to the wall then turn left and walk to the sink.
Wash the wash cloth in the sink and then pick it back up and shut off the water.
Walk back to the tub where you got the cloth from.
Put the cloth back in the tub to the left of where you picked it up.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean wash cloth in the tub.

high_descs: Go straight ahead towards the bathtub.
Pick up the purple towel.
Turn around go to the end of the room, then turn left and go to the sink.
Put the towel in the sink, turn on the faucet, wash the towel then pick it back up.
Turn Left, then go straight towards the bathtub.
Put the towel back in the bathtub.
tasks.task_desc: The pick up a dirty towel and wash it.

high_descs: Walk over to the sink
Grab the rag out of the cabinet
Walk over to the right sink
Wash the rag
Walk over to the tub
Place the rag in the tub

high_descs: turn right and look down towards the sink
open the sink cabinet and take out the rag and close the door
turn right and walk straight then turn left towards the sink
put the rag down in the sink and turn it on then drain the sink and remove the rag from the sink
turn left walk straight then turn left towards the toilet and walk straight towards the shower and turn right towards the bath tub and look down
put the rag down inside of the bath tub

high_descs: Turn right.
Take the rag out of the bottom left cabinet under the sink.
Walk to the right sink.
Wash the rag in the sink.
Turn left and walk to the bathtub.
Place the rag in the bathtub, in front of the bar of soap.
tasks.task_desc: Place a clean rag in a bathtub.

high_descs: Turn right and head towards the gray bin on the floor.
Look up and take the towel from the towel holder on the wall.
Turn around and head towards the bath tub to your right.
Place the towel in front of the pink soap.
Turn around, head towards the toilet, and then turn left towards the sink.
Take the towel from the sink.
Turn around and head towards the bath tub on your right.
Place the towel into the tub.

high_descs: Turn around, then turn right and face the light-switch on your left.
Take the towel from the hook on the right.
Turn around and walk towards the tub, then turn right to face it.
Put the towel in the tub.

Grab a towel from the sink.
Turn left, then left again and face the tub on your right.
Put the towel in the tub in front of you.

high_descs: Walk straight to the left edge of the sink.
Grab the toilet paper off of the sink.
Turn left and face the toilet paper holder.
Place the toilet paper on the holder.

Turn left and walk to the tub

Bring the soap back to the sink
Turn around and return the soap to the shower
